title: WTTF:  Ty Cobb Autographed Pre-War Cards
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: WTTF:  Ty Cobb Autographed Pre-War Cards
posts.post_content:
Who doesn't, right?

But please email me if you are the proud owner of a Ty Cobb autographed pre-war card.  I am certain of the existence of a signed T202, T205, T206 (three poses) and e90-1.  If you would consider a strong trade proposal for one of them, please email me in confidence.  At a minimum, I would love to add a scan to my website.

Send emails to [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]
